segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how the woman is just standing in the puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is probably ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too busy with their cookie heist to notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a bit gross to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sick just watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR
